info.author: Florent Rougon
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
Topic :: Multimedia :: Sound/Audio :: CD Audio :: CD Playing
Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
PyXMMS is a Python package allowing full control of XMMS as well as
management of its configuration file. XMMS is a multimedia player
written for the X Window System.
info.name: pyxmms
info.html_description: PyXMMS is a Python package allowing full control of XMMS as well as management of its configuration file. XMMS is a multimedia player written for the X Window System.
